entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find a way to safely restore the switch dispatch optimization for floating-point types #62390
    C# 12.0
  • Avoid using `SolutionOptionSet` (and `ILegacyWorkspaceOptionService`) with `OptionStore` #62384
  • GetOrCreateCompilationWithAnalyzersAsync throwing null reference exception in integration tests #62381
  • Visual Studio inserting // into C# comments #62380
  • 'CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error #62379
  • 'Convert to raw string without leading whitespace' erroneously strips trailing whitespace #62376
  • Fix double write of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.Internal.dll #62372
  • File and required modifiers are missing from CSharpAccessibilityFacts.GetAccessibilityAndModifiers #62371
  • `#nullable enable` adds a "not CLS-compliant" diagnostic #62368
  • search handler assertion failure #62365

Closed

  • Source generators can't respect DDD #62377
  • Move static members to another type is suggested for top-level statements #59470
    17.3
  • VS setting are very inconsistent in terms of native/custom control usage #62359
  • Generated constructor with invalid parameter name #62162
  • .editorconfig code analysis suppressions not always honored #62064

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase timeout for unix single machine job #62393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add array initialization optimization fix and initial unit tests #62392
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Change the data-flow path for searching for attributes to prevent fewer intermediary tables. #62389
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove expensive and unneeded syntax tree verification #62382
    Area-Compilers
  • Async save integration testing #62378
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 'file-local types' to main #62375
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to a callback for cleaning up resources instead of passing in an explicit IDisposable. #62373
    Area-Compilers
  • Prevent assert from being hit #62366
    Area-IDE
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62297
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #62347
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add suggested lookup tests #62383
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62385
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62386
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Publish main-vs-deps VS PRs #62388
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not strip underscore if the result name will be invalid #62290
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add an Integration test for 'Go to global usings' #62217
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62374
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • REmove use of Lazy in DeclarationTable for rarely used values. #62324
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Do not look for load/reference directives when there can't be any #62323
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Address prototype comments in file types branch #62335
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62397
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62395
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62394
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for file-types in SymbolKey. #62218
    Area-IDE
  • Skip the balanced switch dispatch optimization for patterns on floating point inputs #62322
    Area-Compilers
  • [EnC] Support more symbol deletes #62151
    Area-Compilers
  • Always clear diagnostics when ending a debug session #62270
    Area-IDE
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Reuse prior TableEntry values in the increment NodeTable builder if possible. #62320
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove LangVer check from extended nameof binding #62339
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • All incremental generator perf work #62159
    Area-Compilers
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE, 17.3
